s0014: He died after three years without heirs. The kingdom was abolished as a commandery.
s0017: As Rong departed, he performed farewell rites at Jiangling's north gate.
s0049: When this became known, Han nobles requested Jian's arrest and trial.
s0050: The Son of Heaven spared him and sent ministers to interrogate the king.
s0143: After succeeding the throne, he still neglected Tiao.
